subject: Adding -Djava.ext.dirs causes class not found TestListener
messageBody:
Here is the whole code

<junit dir="${basedir}"
printsummary="yes"
fork="no"
showoutput="yes"
failureproperty="cvt.failed">

<formatter type="xml" />

<classpath>
<path refid="endtoend.classpath"/>
</classpath>

<jvmarg value="${was.naming.provider}" />
<jvmarg value="${was.naming.factory}" />

<jvmarg value="-DxpathConsistency.dataFileDir=${basedir}/data" />
<jvmarg value="-Dcvt.propertyFilePath=./cvt.properties" />
<test name="com.ibm.events.cvt.endtoend.test.ConsistencyTest" />

</junit>

It works ok until I add this line:
<jvmarg value="-Djava.ext.dirs=${was.client.ext.dirs}" />

Then I get:
[junit] The java class is not found: junit/framework/TestListener
[junit] Test com.ibm.events.cvt.endtoend.test.ConsistencyTest FAILED

It might be something simple but I cannot figure it out.

Thanks
